wordGroup: total hysterectomy 全子宫切除；子宫全切术

sentences.en: I had to have a hysterectomy.
sentences.cn: 我不得不做子宫切除手术。

sentences.en: Both of them are effective ways for hysterectomy.
sentences.cn: 2种子宫切除术均为有效的方法。

sentences.en: Objective: to explore the indication of vaginal complete hysterectomy.
sentences.cn: 前言：目的：探讨扩大阴式全宫切除术的适应证。
